item.description:
Abraham Vortex of Attraction™ Workshop
broadcast LIVE from Phoenix, AZ
can be accessed online!

When you become a "practice-tioner" of Law Of Attraction, you can't help but become immersed in the teachings of Abraham. Esther Hicks, a best-selling author & inspirational speaker, says she dialogues with or "channels" a group of spiritual teachers collectively known as "Abraham."

Folks gather at workshops where they ask questions & "Abraham" answers. There's a workshop happening live tomorrow in Phoenix, AZ.

Thanks to awesome technology, this live workshop will be broadcasted live online and accessible to folks who purchase this opportunity. It's $75 (which will be split between everybody who come tomorrow).

Thank you, JON, for welcoming us to your loft to enjoy & learn together.


Time: 10:30 am - 4 pm

**Must show up by 10:45 am**

Workshop: 11 am - 2:50 pm EST
There'll be breaks in between for sharing.

Lunch: Bring your own & drinks

Learn more about this workshop

 

*******************************************************
For folks new to Abraham, go here for list of free resources.
You can SHARE your resources here too.
*******************************************************

Driving/Parking:

When you drive in off of Moody St. keep going straight (do not go into the parking lot on your right) you will see a tall building on the left with "4" on the corner. That's Jon's building, so park near there.

MBTA:

Option 1: Commuter rail outbound from Porter Square towards Fitchburg, Waltham Stop. This lets you out at Jon's doorstep practically. 

Option 2: Bus to Waltham Center, a 5 min walk to Jon's place. 

Jon's studio is 4 big flights up. Call Chew-Hoong at 781-820-3285 if need help or an elevator

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: (Waltham): Watch ABRAHAM LIVE online
